snippet.title: Entertain guests in high style at this Brighton East beauty - realestate.com.au
snippet.content:

A basement theatre room is one of the star attractions of this , offering the ultimate home-entertainment hub with a large living area and built-in wet bar. But, that's not all - another indulgent entertainment hub can be found on the ground floor, where the open-plan living and dining area leads to a covered entertainment zone with a solar-heated pool. A 3m-high ceiling, together with floor-to-ceiling windows and an expansive sliding glass door, accentuate the spacious feel and light-filled living experienced in this part of the home. French oak engineered flooring downstairs also complements the bright and airy setting. SUBURB PROFILE:
The open-plan zone flows out to an entertainment area with inviting solar-heated pool.
There are two more living areas, including a large formal sitting room that greets you on entry, and a combined rumpus and study upstairs. They provide plenty of options for the whole family. The kitchen is top-class, with every stylish fitting and finish imaginable, from imported Italian marble benchtops and splashbacks, to European tapware, a fully integrated Fisher & Paykel fridge and dishwasher, plus stainless steel Miele appliances and Italian-designed Snaidero cabinetry. The home has two main-bedroom suites - downstairs features a 3m-high ceiling and a private sunlit terrace; a walk-in wardrobe with designer timber fitout, including LED-lit drawers, and an ensuite with twin vanity and wet room. The latter has a freestanding bath and separate shower are contained in a fully tiled area behind a glass screen.
The sleek kitchen showcases marble benchtops and Miele appliances.
The ensuite also has fully automated external louvres. The second main-bedroom suite, or guest bedroom, is upstairs and has two built-in wardrobes, an ensuite, and automated external louvres. Two secondary bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, are also upstairs within easy reach of the main bathroom. Each upper-level bedroom, plus the retreat and study, has its own split system for year-round heating and cooling comfort.
The rumpus room upstairs could be configured as a study area.
Other features include limestone floors in the bathrooms and laundry, a basement-level bathroom, ducted heating and cooling downstairs, as well as double-glazed windows. The home is also smart-wired with data points in each room; a video intercom; alarm; plus, there's a lift! AGENT SAYS: "Immaculate, luxurious and spacious living is exemplified in this brand-new, light-filled, modern family home." - Justin Follett, Follett & Co DETAILS: SOLD Price guide: $2.4 million - $2.64 million Agent: Follett & Co Brighton Contact: Justin Follett, 9598 9111 or 0405 996 822; Marcus Heron, 0424 696 822
